text: Márcio de Souza Jotha (born 29 January 1979 in Rio de Janeiro), known as Têti, is a Brazilian former football midfielder, who played for a number of clubs in Portugal and Brazil. == Honours == ; Cabofriense * Campeonato Carioca Série B: 1998 ; Santa Cruz * Campeonato Pernambucano: 2011 ==References== ==External links== * CBF Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (city) Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Associação Desportiva Cabofriense players Category:Friburguense Atlético Clube players Category:Botafogo de Futebol e Regatas players Category:CR Vasco da Gama players Category:Paysandu Sport Club players Category:Ituano FC players Category:Associação Atlética Caldense players Category:Associação Atlética Coruripe players Category:C.F. title: Têti
